channel.title: Evelus
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TTt15.png[/img]
[font=arial black][b][size=18pt]About Us[/size][/b][/font] [size=12pt][font=arial] Hey guys, I'd like to use this section for a little introduction of what Evelus is and a bit of our history. Evelus originally started out as a RSPS community website, the art, and website was created by Jarrod Mosen who came up with the name. Evelus went through various changes, and has settled to be a private server in the past few project attempts. The team has changed many times over the past two years and the only surviving original member that is on the team currently is SiniSoul who manages and operates the team.
Evelus strives for nothing less than 'Doing it right'. That mean, providing top notch emulation, customer support, and fun for everyone. We all enjoy this project, and we enjoy that you to have fun on the services that we provide. So pull up a chair, leave us a comment, and get ready to experience the best we can offer. [/font][/size] [font=arial black][b][size=18pt]The Team[/size][/b][/font]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Team Lead[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]SiniSoul[/font][/size]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Assistant Team Lead[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]Blake[/font][/size]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Public Relations Lead[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]Elrick[/font][/size]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Creative Directors[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]SiniSoul[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=arial]Elrick[/font][/size]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Community Leads[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]Elrick[/font][/size] [size=13pt][font=arial]Xenon[/font][/size]
[b][size=14pt][font=arial]Media Lead[/font][/size][/b]
[size=13pt][font=arial]Xenon[/font][/size]
[font=arial black][b][size=18pt]Technology[/size][/b][/font]
[font=arial] [size=13pt]Ground Item System Added (8/11/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Ground Object System Added (8/11/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Ground Item Option Dispatch System Added (8/11/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Anti No-Clip System Added (8/11/13)[/size] [size=13pt]A* Path Finding Added (8/11/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Item on Item System Added (8/12/14)[/size] [size=13pt]Item Option System Added (8/16/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Item on Object Option System Added (8/16/13)[/size] [size=13pt]Door/Gate/Double Door System Added (8/16/13)[/size] [/font]
[font=arial black][b][size=18pt]Images[/size][/b][/font]

item.title: Evelus
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:577, topic:449028”].[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=551928.msg4357544#msg4357544 date=1377991902]

You can spend thousands on advertising but if your server isnt remotely playable you wont be growing. We have the strongest talent in rsps workimg on the server. With hard work we will rise above the low quality everyday crud. It worked with prs07, itll work for us.

Money makes the server known, THEN content pulls the player in. You can’t have one without the other. It’s sad that a well rounded server could be beat by an everyday piece of garbage with a higher budget, but that’s just how it works. Remember Vault? He gained thousands of registries on a server that didn’t even exist based on false promises. Why? - because he simply had the budget to-do so. It will always come down to money alone. That’s how the real world works, and that’s how the virtual world works too.
[/quote]wut, he didnt pay to advertise anywhere… his was just based on hype

Hype is the key to success. We’re going the route of ‘you want to ask your friends to play because it is that good of a server’.[/quote]
r they talking about vault’s rs remake? cuz that shit got real popular real fast

Read full topic

item.title: Evelus
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

.[quote=“Davidi2, post:576, topic:449028”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=551928.msg4357528#msg4357528 date=1377990746]

You can spend thousands on advertising but if your server isnt remotely playable you wont be growing. We have the strongest talent in rsps workimg on the server. With hard work we will rise above the low quality everyday crud. It worked with prs07, itll work for us.

Money makes the server known, THEN content pulls the player in. You can’t have one without the other. It’s sad that a well rounded server could be beat by an everyday piece of garbage with a higher budget, but that’s just how it works. Remember Vault? He gained thousands of registries on a server that didn’t even exist based on false promises. Why? - because he simply had the budget to-do so. It will always come down to money alone. That’s how the real world works, and that’s how the virtual world works too.
[/quote]wut, he didnt pay to advertise anywhere… his was just based on hype[/quote]

Hype is the key to success. We’re going the route of ‘you want to ask your friends to play because it is that good of a server’.

Read full topic

item.title: Evelus
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:569, topic:449028”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=551928.msg4354104#msg4354104 date=1377167304]
What revision? This looks cool
[/quote]

530

Is this much further than when we all went separate ways ages ago?

Oh god yeah.

Sell it to me. Imagine you’re on The Apprentice, give me your pitch.

DO IT.

Too tired, don’t want to sell it. We’re just better equipped than our competition, and are better off coming up with solutions than our competition. Period. So we are naturally going to be the best after we invest more time into the server.

Also, added in stateful NPCs for a future combat update and now ‘Normal’ NPCs will walk around randomly within their bounds.[/quote]

Being “better equipped” is not limited to just the code in the server. It extends to every resource surrounding game play. And there will always be some one who’s wealthier than you, which will make them “better equipped” than you.

Read full topic
